product_name: Dynafit Vulcan TF Randonee Boots - Men's - 2013/2014
long_description: The Dynafit Vulcan TF randonee boots offer climbing agility without compromising performance on the descent. They can drive modern freeride skis at any speed and stand up to landing big drops.
short_description: The Dynafit Vulcan TF randonee boots offer climbing agility without compromising performance on the descent. They can drive modern freeride skis at any speed and stand up to landing big drops.
